message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you a great opportunity to purchase my product. Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $13,000.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget.
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but my product offers significant value.  How about we meet in the middle at $11,500?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above my budget. How about we meet at $10,500? I really think this product could be a great fit for me, but I need to make it work within my means.
